title: If the land is reserved as per the DP and owner desires to hand over the land without any encumbrances to MCGM/ Appropriate Authority, then he shall be entitled for the grant of TDR as per Regulation No 32
clause_text: If the land is reserved as per the DP and owner desires to hand over the land without any encumbrances to MCGM/ Appropriate Authority, then he shall be entitled for the grant of TDR as per Regulation No 32.
